item.title: Redis Vertical Scaling Overview
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Redis Vertical Scaling Overview This guide will give you an overview on how KubeDB Enterprise operator updates the resources(for example CPU and Memory etc.) of the Redis database. Before You Begin You should be familiar with the following KubeDB concepts: Redis RedisOpsRequest How Vertical Scaling Process Works The following diagram shows how KubeDB Enterprise operator updates the resources of the Redis database.

item.title: Vertical Scaling Redis Cluster
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. This is an Enterprise-only feature. Please install KubeDB Enterprise Edition to try this feature. Vertical Scale Redis Cluster This guide will show you how to use KubeDB Enterprise operator to update the resources of a Redis cluster database. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
